programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Mother Hubbard Case
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes tracks down a murderer who uses a young girl to lure victims to empty houses.

programme.sub-title: The Case of the Red-Headed League
programme.desc: Holmes and Watson track bank robbers.

programme.sub-title: The Case of the Shoeless Engineer

programme.sub-title: The Case of the Split Ticket
programme.desc: Holmes and Watson find Brian O'Casey waiting for them at their flat.

programme.sub-title: The Case of the French Interpreter
programme.desc: A translator tells Holmes he was kidnapped and forced to translate a Frenchman being tortured.

programme.title: The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Three Gables
programme.desc: Thieves purloin the manuscript of a biography of a man who recently died.

programme.title: The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Dying Detective
programme.desc: A man dies of a mysterious tropical disease on which his cousin - his heir - is the sole authority.

programme.title: The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Golden Pince-Nez
programme.desc: Inspector Hopkins calls on Holmes to help solve the murder of young Willoughby Smith.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Perfect Husband
programme.desc: An art dealer warns his wife about being his eighth murder victim.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Jolly Hangman
programme.desc: A traveling salesman is found hanged in his hotel room, but Holmes doesn't believe it is suicide.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Imposter Mystery
programme.desc: While Holmes and Watson are out of town, someone has taken the opportunity to impersonate Holmes.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Exhumed Client
programme.desc: Sherlock investigates Sir Charles Farnsworth's death in his mysterious Farnsworth Castle.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Impromptu Performance
programme.desc: A condemned man scheduled to hang in a day requests Sherlock Holmes to prove his innocence.

programme.sub-title: The Case of the Baker Street Bachelors
programme.desc: To find the blackmailers of a political leader, Holmes and Watson join a lonely hearts club.

programme.sub-title: The Case of the Royal Murderer
programme.desc: Holmes investigates the poisoning of Prince Stefan during his vacation to an estate in the Balkans.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes (1954)
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Haunted Gainsborough
programme.desc: Malcolm MacGregan seeks Holmes's help in solving a mystery of an apparent ghost.

programme.sub-title: The Case of the Unlucky Gambler
programme.desc: A young boy asks for Holmes' help in finding his missing father.

programme.sub-title: The Case of the Diamond Tooth
programme.desc: While walking along the banks of the River Thames, Watson finds a diamond tooth.

programme.sub-title: The Case of the Tyrant's Daughter
programme.desc: Man offers money to his stepdaughter's fiance to disappear.

programme.desc: Watson's encounter with Lady Frances Carfax brings Holmes rushing to the Lake District.
